name: Elementary Spanish II
description: The second part of a two-semester course sequence (82-141, 82-142). Prerequisite: 82-141, a placement score or permission of the Instructor. If a student has studied Spanish before, then s/he must take the placement exam. Instructions for taking the placement exam are in Baker Hall 160.
